title: Understanding Psychostimulants
text: Psychostimulants are substances that increase activity in the brain. They can have various effects on both the mother and the developing fetus.

title: Effects on Pregnancy
text: Consider how substances that stimulate the brain might affect a developing fetus and the pregnancy itself.

hintAnswer: Preterm labor, behavioral problems, attention deficits, brain abnormalities, cardiac anomalies, aggression, $$\frac{anxiety}{depression}$$
title: Potential Complications
text: What are some potential complications that can arise from maternal use of psychostimulants during pregnancy?
choices: Preterm labor, behavioral problems, attention deficits, brain abnormalities, cardiac anomalies, aggression, $$\frac{anxiety}{depression}$$
Preterm labor, behavioral problems, attention deficits
